title: Here's why Robert Shiller's two stock-market indexes are telling wildly different valuation stories.
text:
Social Security to become unable to pay full benefits sooner than previously estimated

The government issues annual trustees reports on Social Security and Medicare. See full story.

What is a platform, and what should one do? The answer could determine the future of Apple and the rest of Big Tech

Computing platforms were created by tech behemoths to dominate the e-commerce and advertising worlds. And they have, but that has created, in turn, antitrust headaches. In addition to the South Korean vote, members of the U.S. Senate are attempting to rein in the powers of Google and Apple's app stores. See full story.

The meme-stock moment turns 1 — unofficially — and welcomes a sophomore class of tickers

GameStop and AMC are still hot, but the lesser meme names are being replaced by a new class one year after Roaring Kitty's seminal tweet. See full story.

Home prices rise at record pace for third straight month — with 6 cities leading the hot housing market

Home prices are rising in every state across the U.S. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

Willis Towers Watson surveyed 961 companies with a combined workforce of over 9.7 million people. See full story.
